author: Jason Douglas
title: Theresa May’s Trade Trip to China Overshadowed by Brexit Troubles
text:
U.K. Prime Minister Theresa May arrived in Beijing on Wednesday to beat the drum for deepening trade ties and showcase her country’s global ambitions, a visit clouded by simmering discord at home over her handling of Brexit negotiations.
Boosting bilateral links with fast-growing economies is a critical part of Britain’s Brexit strategy. But her efforts in China risked being overshadowed by the fallout from the unauthorized disclosure of a government analysis highlighting the potential costs of quitting the bloc, underscoring...
